data.message: Fix stats baseline inflation in scorer: Implemented gated scoring: base_score from triggers only, stats as multiplier (not additive). Zero trigger match = zero score. Fixed the "participation trophy" problem.
data.task: Fix stats baseline inflation in scorer
data.outcome: Implemented gated scoring: base_score from triggers only, stats as multiplier (not additive). Zero trigger match = zero score. Fixed the "participation trophy" problem.
